items.headline: Gold’s searing run halted, silver drops below $100 as expectations of Warsh to Fed hits dollar debasement trade
items.summary_en: A selloff is underway for gold, silver and copper on Friday, as the dollar rises on expectations that Kevin Warsh will be the next Federal Reserve chairman.

items.headline: Trump says he’ll announce his Fed pick Friday morning. Kevin Warsh seen getting president’s nod for the key economic post.
items.summary_en: President Donald Trump said he’ll announce his nominee to chair the Federal Reserve on Friday morning — and prediction markets have turned sharply toward a former Fed governor for the post.
